de.tud.plt.r43ples.management

Class RevisionManagement

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tud.plt.r43ples.management.RevisionManagement

  • public class RevisionManagement
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides methods for interaction with graphs.
    Author:
    Stephan Hensel, Markus Graube

      • putGraphUnderVersionControl

        public static java.lang.String putGraphUnderVersionControl(java.lang.String graphName)
        Put existing graph under version control. Existence of graph is not checked.
        Parameters:
        graphName - the graph name of the existing graph

      • createNewRevision

        public static java.lang.String createNewRevision(java.lang.String graphName,
                                                 java.lang.String addedAsNTriples,
                                                 java.lang.String removedAsNTriples,
                                                 java.lang.String user,
                                                 java.lang.String commitMessage,
                                                 java.lang.String usedRevisionNumber)
                                          throws InternalErrorException
        Create a new revision.
        Parameters:
        graphName - the graph name
        addedAsNTriples - the data set of added triples as N-Triples
        removedAsNTriples - the data set of removed triples as N-Triples
        user - the user name who creates the revision
        commitMessage - the title of the revision
        usedRevisionNumber - the number of the revision which is used for creation of the new revision
        Returns:
        new revision number
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException

      • createNewRevisionWithPatch

        public static java.lang.String createNewRevisionWithPatch(java.lang.String graphName,
                                                          java.lang.String addSetGraphUri,
                                                          java.lang.String removeSetGraphUri,
                                                          java.lang.String user,
                                                          java.lang.String commitMessage,
                                                          java.lang.String usedRevisionNumber)
                                                   throws InternalErrorException
        Create a new revision.
        Parameters:
        graphName - the graph name
        addSetGraphUri - uri of the data set of added triples as N-Triples
        removeSetGraphUri - uri of the data set of removed triples as N-Triples
        user - the user name who creates the revision
        commitMessage - the title of the revision
        usedRevisionNumber - the number of the revision which is used for creation of the new revision
        Returns:
        new revision number
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException

      • createNewRevision

        public static java.lang.String createNewRevision(java.lang.String graphName,
                                                 java.lang.String addedAsNTriples,
                                                 java.lang.String removedAsNTriples,
                                                 java.lang.String user,
                                                 java.lang.String commitMessage,
                                                 java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> usedRevisionNumber)
                                          throws InternalErrorException
        Create a new revision with multiple prior revisions
        Parameters:
        graphName - the graph name
        addedAsNTriples - the data set of added triples as N-Triples
        removedAsNTriples - the data set of removed triples as N-Triples
        user - the user name who creates the revision
        commitMessage - the title of the revision
        usedRevisionNumber - the number of the revision which is used for creation of the new revision (for creation of merged maximal two revision are allowed - the first revision in array list specifies the branch where the merged revision will be created)
        Returns:
        new revision number
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException

      • createNewRevisionWithPatch

        public static java.lang.String createNewRevisionWithPatch(java.lang.String graphName,
                                                          java.lang.String addSetGraphUri,
                                                          java.lang.String removeSetGraphUri,
                                                          java.lang.String user,
                                                          java.lang.String commitMessage,
                                                          java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> usedRevisionNumber)
                                                   throws InternalErrorException
        Create a new revision with multiple prior revisions
        Parameters:
        graphName - the graph name
        addSetGraphUri - uri of the data set of added triples as N-Triples
        removeSetGraphUri - uri of the data set of removed triples as N-Triples
        user - the user name who creates the revision
        commitMessage - the title of the revision
        usedRevisionNumber - the number of the revision which is used for creation of the new revision (for creation of merged maximal two revision are allowed - the first revision in array list specifies the branch where the merged revision will be created)
        Returns:
        new revision number
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException

      • addMetaInformationForNewRevision

        public static void addMetaInformationForNewRevision(java.lang.String graphName,
                                                    java.lang.String user,
                                                    java.lang.String commitMessage,
                                                    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> usedRevisionNumber,
                                                    java.lang.String newRevisionNumber,
                                                    java.lang.String addSetGraphUri,
                                                    java.lang.String removeSetGraphUri)
                                             throws InternalErrorException
        Add meta information to R43ples revision graph for a new revision.
        Parameters:
        graphName - the graph name
        user - the user name who creates the revision
        commitMessage - the title of the revision
        usedRevisionNumber - the number of the revision which is used for creation of the new revision
        addSetGraphUri - name of the graph which holds the add set
        removeSetGraphUri - name of the graph which holds the delete set
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException

      • createTag

        public static void createTag(java.lang.String graphName,
                             java.lang.String revisionNumber,
                             java.lang.String tagName,
                             java.lang.String user,
                             java.lang.String message)
                      throws InternalErrorException
        Create a new tag
        Parameters:
        graphName - the graph name
        revisionNumber - the revision number where the tag should be attached to
        tagName - name of the new tag
        user - user who performs this tag generation
        message - message describing intent of this command
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException

      • createBranch

        public static void createBranch(java.lang.String graphName,
                                java.lang.String revisionNumber,
                                java.lang.String branchName,
                                java.lang.String user,
                                java.lang.String message)
                         throws InternalErrorException
        Create a new branch
        Parameters:
        graphName - the graph name
        revisionNumber - the revision number where the branch should start
        branchName - name of the new tag
        user - user who performs this branch generation
        message - message describing intent of this command
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException

      • createReference

        private static void createReference(java.lang.String referenceType,
                                    java.lang.String graphName,
                                    java.lang.String revisionNumber,
                                    java.lang.String newReferenceName,
                                    java.lang.String user,
                                    java.lang.String message)
                             throws InternalErrorException
        Create a new reference which can be a branch or a tag
        Parameters:
        referenceType - type of reference. can be "branch" or "tag"
        graphName - the graph name
        revisionNumber - the revision number where the reference should start or be attached to
        newReferenceName - name of the new reference
        user - user who performs this reference generation
        message - message describing intent of this command
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException

      • checkGraphExistence

        public static boolean checkGraphExistence(java.lang.String graphName)
        Checks if graph exists in triple store. Works only when the graph is not empty.
        Parameters:
        graphName - the graph name
        Returns:
        boolean value if specified graph exists and contains at least one triple elsewhere it will return false

      • generateFullGraphOfRevision

        public static void generateFullGraphOfRevision(java.lang.String graphName,
                                               java.lang.String revisionName,
                                               java.lang.String tempGraphName)
                                        throws InternalErrorException
        Creates the whole revision from the add and delete sets of the predecessors. Saved in graph tempGraphName.
        Parameters:
        graphName - the graph name
        revisionName - revision number or revision name to build content for
        tempGraphName - the graph where the temporary graph is stored
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException

      • getRevisionInformation

        public static java.lang.String getRevisionInformation(java.lang.String graphName,
                                                      java.lang.String format)
        Download complete revision information of R43ples from SPARQL endpoint. Provide only information from specified graph if not null
        Parameters:
        graphName - provide only information from specified graph (if not NULL)
        format - serialization of the RDF model
        Returns:
        String containing the RDF model in the specified serialization

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        String containing the SPARQL response in specified format

      • purgeGraph

        public static void purgeGraph(java.lang.String graph)

        Parameters:
        graph - graph to be purged

      • checkReferenceNameExistence

        private static boolean checkReferenceNameExistence(java.lang.String graphName,
                                                   java.lang.String referenceName)
        Check whether the branch name is already used by specified graph name.
        Parameters:
        graphName - the corresponding graph name
        referenceName - the branch name to check
        Returns:
        true when branch already exists elsewhere false

      • isBranch

        public static boolean isBranch(java.lang.String graphName,
                               java.lang.String identifier)
        Checks if specified revision of the graph is a branch revision, meaning a terminal node in a branch.
        Parameters:
        graphName - name of the revisioned graph
        identifier - revision number or branch or tag name of the graph
        Returns:
        true if specified revision of the graph is a branch

      • getAddSetURI

        public static java.lang.String getAddSetURI(java.lang.String revisionURI,
                                            java.lang.String revisionGraph)
        Get the ADD set URI of a given revision URI.
        Parameters:
        revisionURI - the revision URI
        revisionGraph - the revision graph
        Returns:
        the ADD set URI, returns null when the revision URI does not exists or no ADD set is referenced by the revision URI

      • getDeleteSetURI

        public static java.lang.String getDeleteSetURI(java.lang.String revisionURI,
                                               java.lang.String revisionGraph)
        Get the DELETE set URI of a given revision URI.
        Parameters:
        revisionURI - the revision URI
        revisionGraph - the revision graph
        Returns:
        the DELETE set URI, returns null when the revision URI does not exists or no DELETE set is referenced by the revision URI

      • getContentOfGraphByConstruct

        public static java.lang.String getContentOfGraphByConstruct(java.lang.String graphName,
                                                            java.lang.String format)
        Get the content of a graph by execution of CONSTRUCT.
        Parameters:
        graphName - the graphName
        format - RDF serialisation format which should be returned
        Returns:
        the constructed graph content as specified RDF serialisation format

      • getResponseHeaderFromQuery

        public static java.lang.String getResponseHeaderFromQuery(java.lang.String query)
        Creates an RDF description for the revision tree of the graphs specified in the given SPARQL query
        Parameters:
        query - SPARQL query
        Returns:
        RDF string containing information for graphs specified in query
